classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

defaultExpanded.description: If true, expands the accordion by default.
defaultExpanded.description_zh: 如果为 true，则默认展开折叠面板。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

disableGutters.description: If true, it removes the margin between two expanded accordion items and the increase of height.
disableGutters.description_zh: 如果为 true，则删除两个展开的手风琴项之间的边距和高度的增加。

expanded.description: If true, expands the accordion, otherwise collapse it. Setting this prop enables control over the accordion.
expanded.description_zh: 如果为 true，则展开手风琴，否则将其折叠。设置此道具可以控制手风琴。

onChange.description: Callback fired when the expand/collapse state is changed.Signature:function(event: React.SyntheticEvent, expanded: boolean) => voidevent The event source of the callback. Warning: This is a generic event not a change event.expanded The expanded state of the accordion.
onChange.description_zh: 更改展开/折叠状态时触发回调。Signature：function（event： React.SyntheticEvent， expanded： boolean） => voidevent 回调的事件源。警告：这是一个通用事件，而不是更改事件。expanded 手风琴的扩展状态。

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.
slotProps.description_zh: 里面每个插槽使用的道具。

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.
slots.description_zh: 内部每个插槽使用的组件。

square.description: If true, rounded corners are disabled.
square.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用圆角。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

TransitionComponent.description: The component used for the transition. Follow this guide to learn more about the requirements for this component.Deprecated - Use slots.transition instead. This prop will be removed in v7. How to migrate.
TransitionComponent.description_zh: 用于过渡的组件。按照本指南了解有关此组件要求的详细信息。已弃用 - 请改用 slots.transition。这个道具将在 v7 中被移除。如何迁移。

TransitionProps.description: Props applied to the transition element. By default, the element is based on this Transition component.Deprecated - Use slotProps.transition instead. This prop will be removed in v7. How to migrate.
TransitionProps.description_zh: 应用于过渡元素的道具。默认情况下，该元素基于此 Transition 组件。已弃用 - 请改用 slotProps.transition。这个道具将在 v7 中被移除。如何迁移。

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback fired when the expand/collapse state is changed.Signature:event The event source of the callback. Warning: This is a generic event not a change event.expanded The expanded state of the accordion.
events.description_zh: 更改展开/折叠状态时触发回调。Signature：event 回调的事件源。警告：这是一个通用事件，而不是更改事件。expanded 手风琴的扩展状态。
